category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_4gd_allow_creation_if_registry_down
preference.preference_description: Allows 4th Generation Design (4GD) objects to be created even if the registry server is unavailable. If set to "false", 4th Generation Design (4GD) objects creation will fail if registry is active and the registry server is unavailable.
